'''''Ocean Circuit Judge''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]] Ocean Circuit Judge.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Ocean Circuit Judge can be found underwater at the most north-eastern point of the [[Beryl Region]].
